review: Great product and easy to use!
author: Gina Romero

review: I really enjoy using the Chromecast. I have Netflix and Hulu and they both work great! Really happy that I got this for christmas AND I purchased one during Black Friday!
author: Audry K. Mcdonald

review: It was worth the money...a great deal and great device
author: Aju Mohan Chalu Parambil

review: Excellent...so much you can do with this
author: Devo79me

review: its works just fine. but it doesnt access Amazon prime content so we returned it because the main reason for the purchase was to watch amazon prime videos on a non smart TV
author: Jennifer

review: The chromecast worked better than I had anticipated.  It was easy to install and incorporate into our viewing repertoire.  Thank you for this excellent product.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I basically don't need cable anymore! So easy to use and you can't beat the price
author: Alex V.
